title: Blue essence is useless
body:
kinda mad that i cant use this at all
Edit: i own all champions

replies.body: But you'll be able to reroll champion shards into new champions on day 1 release. Except you turned them all into essence like an idiot.

> [{quoted}](name=regaline,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=E7zO30xL,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-03-20T01:05:52.441+0000)
>
> But you'll be able to reroll champion shards into new champions on day 1 release. Except you turned them all into essence like an idiot.

again
Edit: i own all champions
He's saying that if you still have Champion Shards, when new champions are released. If you reroll three of the shards into one, you will be given for example Aurelion Sol after he is released live.
True BUT most people who own all champions have enough IP to just buy new champions outright. So either way I guess it's a moot point unfortunately
you can use ip for other things though.

That's also true. But there gets to a point where you still have an overflow of IP (depending on the frequency one plays).

It's gotten so bad for me that whenever I have over 22k IP (13900 + 7800), I think if I want to change my name or not. Because I already have all champs, rune pages, and all the runes I need.

But either way, it's a moot point. Don't get me wrong though. I'm not saying it's not nice to have this extra option as it is VERY nice.
Like buying those shitty energy runes.
you never know, most people thought armor was bad at first.
Energy runes have been proven to be mathematically and practically the worst.

Unfortunatley, this is unlikely.

When you get a champion shard (either from a box or a reroll) you can get it from any champion, whether you own them or not.

When Aurelion Sol is released, getting a champion shard will give you a 1/130 chance of getting an Aurelion Sol shard.
You don't need an Aurelion Shard. You can roll 3 shards of ANY champion into a permanent champion, AKA, whatever new champion has just been released. So it wouldn't matter anyway.

oooh you can? sweet
It guarantees you a champ you don't own, so if there's only one you don't own you can reroll into that 100% of the time.
Can confirm. This is how I got {{champion:223}} .

Riot has stated that they're working on a solution to this. 

It's so annoying when people bitch and moan without taking the slightest bit of effort to look into an issue.

The fact that they are working on a fix doesn't make it suddenly not frustrating while we wait.

It's like saying you shouldn't be annoyed with cramps or something because someone is on their way to the pharmacy for your prescription of painkillers. Yeah a solution is imminent, but it's still inconvenient in the meantime. Ya know?

Eh. Fair enough.

At the same time though. Nobody is forcing you to _read_ these threads. :/

foolishly spent money on crates and got multiple champion shards. i also own all champions, needless to say i will not spend money on hextech crafting anymore. not very fond of giving riot money for nothing in return.

Bought one chest to unlock since I crafted a key and had none, (oh it's 125rp, it'll be worth it.)
Got Miss Fortune. Owned Miss Fortune.

I knew to stop right there.

I bought a single chest when I found I didn't like anything in my default chest.

Got Dragon Trainer Tristana.

For that alone, I will like the system.
we are in the same exact situation. 5 champ shards... like wtf

Riot said they are working on some ideas for other uses for blue essences so people who own every champ don't get left out. personaly I think one quick idea till they come up with some more tangible uses (like champs / skins) is to allow people to use champ essences to buy re-rolls in ARAM. That will give 'em a use till riot figures out other uses for blue essences while providing a way to get re-rolls in ARAM aside from just playing a bunch of ARAM.

> [{quoted}](name=Blue Moon Wolf,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=E7zO30xL,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2016-03-20T07:34:15.038+0000)
>
> Riot said they are working on some ideas for other uses for blue essences so people who own every champ don't get left out. personaly I think one quick idea till they come up with some more tangible uses (like champs / skins) is to allow people to use champ essences to buy re-rolls in ARAM. That will give 'em a use till riot figures out other uses for blue essences while providing a way to get re-rolls in ARAM aside from just playing a bunch of ARAM.

if you own all the champions, you get a reroll every 2 games. how often are you rerolling so that you can't even have a reroll every time you want one?

There are many games where you wish you have a reroll in ARAM, especially if you own a lot of melee champs that are horrible on ARAM like me. Completely one sided matches are very common in ARAM. Though this is more for a quick fix to how there is no use for blue essences after people own every champ or own all the champs they care to own. 
Riot would obviously need to figure out some other uses that are more along the lines of a champ, ward or skin. but in the meantime, this would give some kind of other use for blue essences, give ARAM players a reason to play more SR and hopefully cut down on one sided matches in ARAM.
I have all of those EXACT feels. T_T

Amen, brother.

Its like Riot is taking a big blue dump into my crafting inventory.

I've had all champions perpetually since sometime in season 2 or 3? I can't even remember. All I know is that I bought Karthus last, then shortly afterwards champion release rates dropped dramatically.

I have enough skins, I want interesting things to get with this "hextech dust".

Give me champion auras, hextech-only ward skins, special taunt particles for mastery taunts, chroma sets, let me have my summoner icon IN MATCHES SOMEWHERE, etc.
I am certain Riot will find a use for blue essence. Remember that the system is brand new and they are working out all of the kinks first.

They are planning to give use to champ shards (and presumably blue essence too) for those who have all champs. Last I heard the plan was to use it to unlock champion mastery levels 6/7, although obviously that's subject to change.

I probably would hold on to champ shards though versus immediately converting them, since that's one way and the convert value is static, so best to hold on to any shards in case you need those rather than the essence in the future.

I read the title to this tread as Essence Reaver, and I was like "I use it all the time, what are you talking about?" lol i was pretty confused when if found out it was about crafting lol ^_^

As someone who owns a large chunk of the champions and have around 120k IP laying around, this. I mean I'm not angry at Riot for creating this gap, since many players won't have anything but good times with it. But personally I would appreciate something meaningful to use my blue essence and IP on.

most people dont have all the champs. those people that do should be happy with their vast selection of champs during the important part of league of legends (the gameplay aspect, believe it or not). you're jealous that riot didnt implement this for most of the time that you've played. if riot gave free skins to everyone nobody would spend money on league and the game would either die or they'd have to make huge cuts to anywhere but the salary of the highest ranked fat cats, which everyone knows, happens very rarely. the point is riot giving us less popular revenue-earning items like ward skins and chroma packs is a way to help prolong the downfall of league if ever there was one, while giving back to the community something that riot thought would be nice for both parties, or whatever other reason

People that own all the champions just don't get to participate in hextech crafting? If the opening videos on youtube are anything to go by something like 50% or greater of all chests that I open will be a thing I can't even use. No, blue essence is worthless to me, I have a perpetual stock of over 60k IP to spend on new champs so I will straight up never need 3 shards + essence to get the new guy that comes out. I don't care if its the most worthless, meaningless nonsense ever, just give me a reason to open the chests I'm stockpiling from getting all these S ranks.

I want to like hextech crafting. I want to be part of this fun everyone is having, too.
